entry.title: Moussa Dembele’s Sell On Clause
entry.summary: MOUSSA DEMBELE could be on his way to the Premier League this summer, but it’s not great news for Celtic,. The bhoys sold Moussa for a record fee at the time [£21m] to French side Lyon but also added a sell-on clause. The Hoops always look to get a little extra out of their top […] Source

entry.title: Joe Ledley makes class Celtic prediction that will be tough for rivals to hear
entry.summary: Joe Ledley thinks Kyogo Furuhashi is going to be even better for Celtic over the coming season than he was last term, greatly praising the Japanese sensation. The Welshman also thinks this special group are going to win the title again. Kyogo made a wonderful impact at the Bhoys in his debut campaign, arriving last ... entry.title: Double Injury Boost: Ange Clears Up Weekend Mystery
entry.summary: ANGE POSTECOGLOU has delivered a double injury boost for Celtic fans ahead of the next phase of pre-season. The Hoops played out a 3-3 draw against Rapid Vienna on Saturday but did so without Josip Juranovic or Anthony Ralston. Ange allowed Osaze Urhoghide to play at right back in their absence but the defender didn’t […] Source

entry.title: Celtic fringe player praised by Postecoglou after Austria shift
entry.summary: Osaze Urhoghide has had a surprisingly prominent role to play in Celtic’s opening pre-season games, being the only player who has completed both 90 minutes against Wiener Viktoria and Rapid Vienna. Urhoghide has been primarily used as a right-back over both games but also slotted in as a centre-back when Christopher Jullien went off against ... entry.title: Ange Postecoglou provides injury update after Saturday Celtic absences
entry.summary: Celtic manager Ange Postecoglou has provided an update on Anthony Ralston and Josip Juranovic after they were missing from Saturday’s match squad against Rapid Vienna. The Bhoys boss named almost the entire Austrian group on the bench behind the starters in the 3-3 draw, but the two right-backs were not listed, leading to concerns about ... entry.title: Celtic manage expectations as outlets get excited about weekend transfer update
entry.summary: Ange Postecoglou has made it clear that Celtic’s reported bid for Dylan Reid is not relevant in terms of strengthening the first team this summer. entry.title: Rapid 3-3 Celtic - Goals & Reaction
entry.summary:
Photo by Craig Williamson/SNS Group via Getty Images
The hoops second pre season game this summer resulted in an entertaining 3-3 draw with Rapid Vienna. Here’s the goals in case you missed them:
Not a lot to take away from games like this where it’s all about fitness, but it was good to see Hatate, O’Riley and Kyogo looking sharp, and it’s good of Joseph Hart to get the blunders out the way now before the domestic campaign kicks off. There was an immediate reaction to the match on 67HH yesterday which you can find below!

entry.title: Judas Day of Infamy – A despicable deed done to hurt Celtic
entry.summary: Maurice Johnston was born in Glasgow on 13 April 1963. He began his career at Partick Thistle in 1981, scoring 41 goals in 85 appearances, before winning a transfer to Elton John’s Watford in 1983. Johnston scored 23 league goals in English football, made his international debut, and helped the team reach 1984 FA Cup Read More
